titleStmt.title: Tamiḻneṟi Viḷakkam 22.
Experimenting with formatting for the final edition.

witness.expan: A Critical Edition and Study of Akapporul Vilakkam [ante correctionem]
A Critical Edition and Study of Akapporul Vilakkam [post correctionem]
Kuṟuntokai 130. Veḷḷi Vīti(yār): the confidante / SHE

body.head: Commentary
body.p: kaṟpiṉōṭuṅ kāvalōṭunalattiṉōṭuṅ kulattiṉōṭum ulakiṉōṭumāṟukōḷ illā moḻiyāṟ ṟalaimakaḷ tōḻikkaṟattoṭu niṟṟaṉ mutal āka varaivetir kōṭal īṟākac collap paṭṭa vivai yaṟattoṭu nilai yām eṉṟu colluvar pulavar eṉṟa vāṟu.

div.p: eṉpatu cevili talaimakaḷaip puṉaintiyārō vivaḷai eytutaṟkariya peruntakai eṉat tōḻi aṟattoṭu niṉṟatu.
eṉpatu talaimakaḷ vēṟupāṭu kaṇṭu cevili viṉavak kaṭṭuvicci colliyatu.
eṉpatu cevili veṟi kālkoḷḷat talaimakaḷ iraṅkiyatu.
eṉpatu talaimakaḷ āṟṟāmai yuṇarnta tōḻi yaṟattoṭu niṟṟaṟakkateṉṟatu.
eṉpatu āṟṟāḷ āy niṉṟa talaimakaḷait tōḻi poym moḻintaṉaṉ eṉa vāṟṟuvittatu.
eṉpatu tōḻi yaṟattoṭu nilai nayappikkak kūṟiyatu.
eṉpatu veṭṭiṉ kaṇ vēlaṉ mēl vaittut tōḻi yaṟattoṭu niṉṟatu.
eṉpatu cevili viṉavat tōḻi yaṟattoṭu niṉṟatu.
eṉpatu varaivu maṟutta vaḻit talaimakaḷ āṟṟāḷ āyiṟṟu.
